name: abductor
content:
abductor noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who makes someone go somewhere with them, especially using threats or violence: She was tortured by her abductors. It is thought that the woman might have known her abductor.

abductor noun [C]
(MUSCLE)
medical
  specialized a muscle that moves a part of the body away from the middle of the body or from another body part
